description: generate html named 'index.html' with a body(margin 0) tag in which there is a div(class 'root'). NO JS.

add divs(class 'header', 'footer', 'main') with arbitrary text in '.root' element. '.root' occupies total viewport and children elements together occupy total '.root' space. header is always fixed at the top of '.root'; footer is always fixed at the bottom of '.root'; main occupies the remaining '.root' space. Use css flexbox only, NO css grid, float and position, NO js.

add divs(class 'leftbar', 'content', 'rightbar') with arbitrary text in main(padding 0) to fill the whole space. leftbar(width 200px) is fixed at the left of main; rightbar(width 200px) is fixed at the right of main; content occupies the remaining main space. Use flexbox only.
clear header content. add menu(class 'menu') with 3 items(arbitrary text) at the right side of header. Use flexbox only too.
add logo(class 'logo') with arbitrary background color at the left side of header. Use flexbox only.
leftbar should disappear when page width is equal to or less than 799px.
when page width is equal to or less than 799px, menu items should have evenly spaced distribution in the whole header space and logo should disappear.
when page width is equal to or less than 399px, main should occupy full page width and rightbar should be at the bottom of main.
when page width is less than 400px, each menu item should occupy full page width.
separate leftbar space to 20 rows and 2 columns. NO remaining space or overflow. page height is still 100vh. MUST use flexbox align-content, align-self, MUST NOT use css calc function.

directly add 40 divs(class 'tag') in rightbar with 2 tags in each row; no other element between tags and rightbar; all tags fill whole rightbar width and height, NO remaining space and overflow. page height is still 100vh. Use flexbox only, no calc.
when page width is less than 400px, display the first 3 rows in rightbar.
show 12 cards (class 'card') in content with 3 per row, 100px minimum height each and vertical scrolling enabled.
when page width is less than 1000px, display 2 cards per row in content.
when page width is less than 600px, display 1 cards per row in content.
each card has a image(class 'card-image'), title and price; title's minimum height is 1.5rem and no wrap; price's minimum height is 1rem; image uses the remaining space.
only change one css property to reverse the order of all cards.
add a logo(class 'footer-logo') and info (class 'footer-info') in the footer. footer-info should never wrap and should show ellipsis when space is insufficient.
add left-drag and right-drag with absolute positions at the left and right sides of the content; left-drag and right-drag are not visible by default and become visible when mouse hovers over content.
gen js, drag right-drag and left-drag to adjust content width.
when page width is less than 400px, move right-drag to the bottom of content and drag right-drag to adjust content height.
